Get to know the stadium
It currently has a capacity of 55,097 spectators, distributed in oval-shaped grandstands, and is being expanded to 62,170 seats, consolidating itself as one of the most modern and impressive stages in English football.

No margin of error
Statistics
Manchester City are unbeaten in their last five matches in all competitions and have won four of them, their previous 3-1 loss to Bodo/Glimt in the UEFA Champions League last month.
Memories of the visitor
Previous training
This is how visitors arrive
The challenge will not be easy: he has barely won three of 44 visits against teams that started the day in the top three. In addition, Marco Silva has lost his 13 Premier League duels against Manchester City, and Fulham have accumulated eight consecutive defeats at Etihad in the league.
That‚Äôs how the locals get
Now, Guardiola‚Äôs team returns to Etihad, where they are going through an impressive streak: 44 of the last 51 points at home and 11 unbeaten matches against their fans. In addition, he largely dominates Fulham, his next rival, with a historic streak of victories, and boasts an unbeaten 55 matches as a local midweek in the Premier.
Statements by Marco Silva, DT Fulham
"It‚Äôs going to be a City full of motivation to try and get the three points, but we also want to recover from the last game, from the last defeat, and we have to go match them and make our game and have a plan behind the game that allows us to fight for the three points".
Statements by Pep Guardiola, DT Man. City
"The Fulham is better every season, with the moves, patterns and quality they have, the composure with the game and speed they have. Both the defense and the attack are really good. Marco is one of the best coaches I have ever faced".
